title: cleanup & update dependencies
message:
cleanup & update dependencies

* set minSDK to 19 (android 4.4). This does only affect 0.5% of our users and allows usage of newer functions (e.g. paddingEnd) and libraries in the future
* update libraries and build tools version
* run android lint => clean up code and remove unused res

title: fix a crash when opening app from notification
message:
fix a crash when opening app from notification

* The crash was introduced with the commit prior to this one. The problem was that the intent check was too early and had to be moved to onStart.
* Also fix time conversion and make it unified by using TimeUtils' conversion.

title: clean up MyFirebaseMessagingService.java & fix notifs
message:
clean up MyFirebaseMessagingService.java & fix notifs

* avoid duplicate notifications by providing the same id for each notification with the same details (title, link, content). Means the old one will be simply overwritten instead of showing twice the same
* fix a bug that the notif wasn't cleared after unsubscribing from that category
* fix a bug that multiple different videos at the same time were not shown in some cases

title: load only the needed posts from firebase, not all
message:
load only the needed posts from firebase, not all

* disadvantage: 4 requests at max now instead of one before
* advantage: the db gets bigger each day; currently reponses are always 200kb big, now it stays between 5kb and 30kb worst case

title: Refactor code to use MVP; add JUnit testing for PostPresenter; Simplify code (#86)
message:
Refactor code to use MVP; add JUnit testing for PostPresenter; Simplify code (#86)

* **Refactor classes: new package names & new class names & use interfaces for easier testing => MVP**
 * Extract model logic from PostPresenter into new class (PostModelImpl.java)


* **Make PostPresenter testable**
 * make NetworkUtil non static to be able to mock it
 * pass an instance of DatabseHelper and NetworkUtil instead of creating it in Presenter
 * make number of "posts to load" consistent


* **Add JUnit tests (~80% coverage of PostPresenter)**
 * Verify that view methods get called with correct insert ranges
 * Verify sorting
 * Verify filtering of duplicate posts
 * Verify filtering of posts that are "too late" or "too early"
 * Verify no network error is called
 * Verify last and first dates are correct


* **Refactor PostPresenter to use notifyItemRangeInserted instead of notifyDataSetChanged**
 * combine updateCurrentPosts and addPosts to a Observable.Transformer sortAndFilterNewPosts
 * extract addDateTags into Transformer to avoid duplicate code
 * extract updateSettingsFilters to an extra method as it worked differently than the occurences of updateCurrentPosts
 * add & update docs
 * add notifyItemRangeInserted as it is possible with the now refactored code

title: Caching fixed + Optimized
message:
Caching fixed + Optimized 

Fixed an Issue, where cache was not cleared, because the path was wrong

Improved Caching of Drawables:
The system will run this sequence
 - if HD images are cached, they are displayed
 - if not and HD images should be loaded, they will be fetched
- if normal image is cached - load from cache
- if not, fetch from url

DatabaseHelper changed:
- will now save URLs of both HD and non-HD image, if set
- removed hasThumbnail column

title: Update Rxjava logic to be more generic and failsafe (#56)
message:
Update Rxjava logic to be more generic and failsafe (#56)

* A new code structure: Rewrite presenters to be more generic (all return an Observable<PostBuilder>). Merge those Observables into one and execute them all at once in one place. This results into better error handling, less duplicates and cleaner code.

* use retrofit instead of sdk for firebase database because the firebase SDK does not allow synchronous actions which are needed for the presenter structure

* Better error handling/logging:
 
 * don't log crashes in debug to firebase

 * Report Log error (Log.e) with throwables automatically to firebase

 * Log more errors (to logcat and firebase) instead of ignoring them

* Settings: Use onactivityresult instead of static booleans for "clear cache" callback.

* Settings: Added spinner instead of 2 switches for the HD image setting

* Fixed Facebook HD images not loading

* Add more docs & update existing

* Remove now deprecated / unused code

title: Endless scroll (#35)
message:
Endless scroll (#35)

* YT first try endless scrolling

added YT endless scroll
added general Class change and new necessary functions
added todos for bugfixes
changed way of post loading -> now via PostManager

* Endless-scrolling Iteration 1 for YT and Pietcast done

Added structural methods and YT / Pietcast as "How-To"
Added ToDos, which should be done before merging in develop

* Fixes and new Todos for tomorrow

Added clearDB and clearPosts for clearing Cache

* Launcher Icon and small changes

* simplify logic, refactor code to avoid duplicates

add more todos :(

* added twitter to load but WIP not working correctly

* First Try / Twitter just 5 newest posts needs a rework

* Documentation & some todos fixed

Documented some stuff and fixed a todo with the Date if no posts are
loaded. Also investigated on the performance issue made a todo mark

* TWITTER fixed

Twitter still buggy,
improved performance (Still investigating for more improvements) 
- Need to investigate caching issues & timeline issues (for example: Posts not added, even if there is a Post )

* fix merge

* Cache delete now fixed

Cache now deletes Posts and Color of BG fixed

* Twitter Done & Caching WIP

Twitter posts load normally
Caching reactivated WIP needs rework

* removed ToDo's

* FAB

FAB added to Scroll back to the Top

* About updated and Logo added to Nav

* load only posts that are at max 2 days old, update dependencies

* add api_ID to db

* fixed DB loading less Posts than needed

-> If cached Posts are less than needed Posts to load on Start -> Postmanager now instead of adding the cached Posts and reloading the same + additional new Posts, now directly reloads all Posts without adding the cached ones first.

* WIP fix DB app_ip as Long

Still Facebook need investigation -> some Posts are rejected

* catch gradle exception if git does not exist

* Switch Colors improved

title: Caching & Generic Posts (#13)
message:
Caching & Generic Posts (#13)

* Features:
 - Ignoriere deine Typzuordnungen, weil ichs kann (hauptsächlich weil ich mit String typen arbeite)
  - Posts werden gecached
  - Converter: konvertiert zwischen CardTypes (int) und Generic Posts (String)
  - 4 Manager Klassen: File- & Cache Manager, Unterklassen von IoManager die Dateien in verschiedenen Teilbereichen der Anwendungsdaten verwalten; Managers ermöglicht einen bequemen Zugriff auf beide
  - PostCache: Die Klasse die Post in den Cache schreibt und aus dem Cache hervorkramt
  - Post/ThumbnailPost/VideoPost: Die Klassen die die versch. Arten von Posts wiederspiegeln

* Features:
 - schöne Farben
 - Enum Types: Convertierung zw. CardTypes.VIDEO (1) und Types.VIDEO ("video") notwendig, damit in den Dateien nicht einfach nur 0 steht
 - Es funktioniert!
 - Drawables werden gespeichern. Meistens :)
 - Java ist ein Arschloch ("String" == "String") != ("String".equals("String"))

* + added CardItem.toPost()
+ added auto-cache (beware of heavy writing)

* Save Posts onPause()

* posts werden nicht mehr 2x eingelesen
